send-description: Select a due date for the request before submitting
confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this request?
public-comment-placeholder: This is a public comment. Every user with access to this request can see it
private-comment-placeholder: This a private comment. Only you and your collaborators can see it
creator: Owner
search-placeholder: Search by request code or application
confirm-close: You can edit the public comment before the request is closed. Once closed, it will no longer be possible to reopen the request.
reminder-description: Are you sure you want to send a reminder to everyone in charge of the current step?
applications-selection-description: Select one or more applications to associate with the evidence request
users-selection-description: Select, for all the steps of each application, the focal points (with any delegates) or approvers
request-text-description: Enter a description of this new request to provide more information to users who have access to the request
additional-info-description: Enter a private comment (visible only to the creator of the request) and a public comment (visible to all users with access to the request)
attachments-description: In this section it is possible to upload attachments. Warning: files with the same name cannot be uploaded
select-user-group: Conflicts exist as a result of selecting several controls. Select a predefined group of focal points and delegates or enter them manually
